name: Excalidraw
longDescription: Excalidraw is a collaborative, shared whiteboard for typed text and sketching. It's really useful for summarising notes & making diagrams for forum posts; it's one of the tools I've used a lot to make these tutorials! Its key attractions are simplicity and easy collaboration. It is designed for quickly creating simple graphics, and has a sloppy/whiteboard style.
description: An open source virtual hand-drawn style whiteboard. Collaborative and end-to-end encrypted.
